titleStmt.title: John Bennett et al. to James F. Robinson
CWG7778

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
Richmond Nov 1st 1862
To his Excellency Jas F Robinson

The election of John W Bourn to the office of County Judge for this County, leaves a vacancy in this district for Magistrate, -- We therefore knowing our fellow townsman R H Johnson to be a gentleman of fine sense and judgment, and thoroughly qualified to discharge in every particular the duties of said office, RespfullyRespectfully suggest that you appoint him to fill said vacancy

John Bennett
Will Rodes
C W White
Jas R Williams
S P Walters
M McClanahan
R.. G.. Burton
P. C. Ballard
David Irvine
Tho. H. Barnes
C. F. Burman

Madison Co
J P. Dist
No 1.
Appt Made
Nov. 7. 1862
